1.content:
Persona has a lot of female characters spread among its major entries, so let's narrow down the playing field, shall we?

Pick which game you'd like to start with:
1.title: The story we will... expand upon

11.content:
Persona 3 was the first Persona to introduce the high school life sim elements that are now iconic to the series. It's also chock full of classic waifu material just waiting to be fattened up.
So which character do you want to start with?
11.title: Persona 3

111.content:
Yukari is the Lovers social link of P3, a kind girl who is one of the first people the protagonist meets when they move to Tatsumi Port Island.
How do we want Yukari to gain weight?
111.title: Yukari Takeba

112.content:
The Empress, Mitsuru Kirijo.
The calm, level-headed heiress to the Kirijo group, Mitsuru is rarely seen not in control of a situation and is one of the founding members of S.E.E.S.
How is she going to get fat today?
112.title: Mitsuru Kirijo

12.content: Ah, yes. Persona 4, the upbeat story of supernatural murders ravaging a small town. There are a number of good options in this game to choose from, so let's give you some options:
12.title: Persona 4

121.content:
Chie, the Chariot.
A spunky young girl with an obsession for kung-fu movies.
How do we want Chie to get fat?
121.title: Chie Satonaka

122.content:
Yukiko Amagi, the High Priestess.
A timid young woman who has conflicting feelings about inheriting her family's inn, and a tendency to burst into fits of hysterical laughter at the slightest provocation.
What's going to make Yuki-chan gain weight?
122.title: Yukiko Amagi

123.content:
Rise Kujikawa, of the Lovers arcana.
A small town girl turned pop idol, turned small town girl again. She's high energy with a never-say-die attitude and a not-so-subtle crush on Yu Narukami, the protagonist.
What will make Rise fat?
123.title: Rise Kujikawa

124.content:
Naoto Shirogane, the Wheel of Fortune.
Nicknamed "the detective prince" she disguised herself as a guy for many months before her secret finally came out. She's a little insecure about her femininity, but she definitely has a charm and confidence about her that makes it hard not to like her.
What's going to cause our detective prince to blimp up?
124.title: Naoto Shirogane

125.content: A few more options for you:
125.title: More Options

13.content:
Persona 5, the long-awaited recent installment in the Persona series, is teeming with well written potential love interests.
Who do you want to start with?
13.title: Persona 5

131.content:
Ann, the lovely Panther.
An efffortlessly gorgeous girl who is more than just a pretty face. Her undying affection for her friend Shiho led her to join the Phantom Thieves, and her godlike metabolism is just waiting to give out on her, the perfect excuse for her to pack on some pounds...
131.title: Ann Takamaki

132.content:
Queen, aka Makoto Niijima.
Student council president of Shujin Academy and younger sister of prosecutor Sae Niijima, Makoto struggles with self-esteem issues but has an honest desire to help others and is probably the love interest the game most wants the player to take.
How will she pack on the pounds?
132.title: Makoto Niijima

133.content:
Futaba Sakura, codename: Oracle.
Adopted daughter of Sojiro Sakura, and a shut-in until she met the Phantom Thieves. Adorable and socially awkward, and nerdy to boot.
Why is Futaba getting fat?
133.title: Futaba Sakura

1332.content:
What kind of magic is making Futaba pudgy?

Cognitive Corpulence - Futaba enters Mementos and encounters the shadow of an FA that can alter the cognitive landscape, even on Persona users! Can Futaba get away before this enigmatic shadow turns her into a complete butterball?

A New Awakening - Futaba has alway wanted to be fat - her metabolism has just thwarted her every attempt thus far. But after being brave enough to join the phantom thieves, decide to begin school again, and even managing to go to the beach that one time, her persona has gotten pretty powerful; Maybe she can use that power to accomplish her desires?
1332.title: Magic Fat-aba

choices: Asks Joker to come over so she can tell him
Chickens out and decides not to talk to Joker
Joker suddenly texts her with a confession
13322.content:
"Sigh" Futaba moaned as she flopped onto her bed "Siiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiigggggggghh"

The scrawny hacker put her hands across her flat tummy. "Boy, what I wouldn't give for you to be a bit bigger, old friend" Futaba said to her own stomach "Why do you have to be so good at keeping me teeny-tiny?"

Futaba may have been a petite young woman, but she was a child of the internet, and like many people online, her tastes were somewhat... deviant. For as long as she could remember, Futaba had had an obsession with stuffing and weight gain, particularly her own. Unfortunately, her metabolism and her mother, and later on her adopted father, Sojiro, had other ideas. Sojiro might actually help her if he knew that being plus-sized was what she wanted, considering all the other bad habits he had enabled for her over the years, but she couldn't take that risk.

In fact, she couldn't risk telling anybody about her little kink. It had taken all of her bravery to ask the Phantom Thieves to change her heart last summer, and that was life-or-death for her. She could only imagine the humiliation if this particular secret got out.

"You know what? NO. I'm not hiding this any longer! I'll never get anywhere keeping this a secret!"Futaba exclaimed to herself. "If there's one person I can trust, it's Joker! He'd never let me down, even for something as weird and creepy as this!"

So Futaba hoisted herself out of bed, reached for her phone to text Joker, and...
13322.title: A New Awakening

134.content:
Noir, Haru Okumura.
The daughter of the CEO of Okumura foods, Haru is a sweet, soft-spoken girl with a surprising sadistic streak.
Why is Haru gaining weight?
134.title: Haru Okumura

135.content: More Persona 5 females to fatten:
135.title: Other

info.brief_description: Help the girls of Personas 3, 4 and 5 gain weight!
info.description:
Welcome...

...to the Velvet Room.

This place exists between mind and matter, dream and reality. Here, you will choose how you want the female characters of the Persona series to gain weight. But first, let's set some guidelines...

1. No character death, random crossovers with other series, or other extreme variation from canon material (within reason, seeing as how this is a WG fic, after all)

2. Weight gain only, small amounts of male WG is allowed, but the focus should be kept on the female characters,light slob is allowed, but nothing beyond burping, messy eating, etc.

3. Keep your grammar and spelling clean. I may do minor editing on entries to fix small errors.

4. Nothing explicitly pornographic in nature. Het/homo romance is acceptable, but keep the smut limited.

Without further ado, let us begin...
